name: Unity Project 8 - Simple 2D Endless Runner
description:
You're a square trying to escape through rooftops. Don't think, just RUN!

Easy Mode

Press SPACE to Jump. (Rapidly JUMP near WALLS to Wall Jump.) (Android: Left Joystick UP)

Press the A and D keys or the LEFT and RIGHT Arrow keys to Rotate. (Android: Left Joystick LEFT & RIGHT)

Pick up the Yellow Capsules that fall from the sky for EXTRA LIVES!

Normal Mode

Press SHIFT with the A or D keys (LEFT or RIGHT Arrow keys) to Dash. (Android: Right Joystick LEFT & RIGHT)

There are falling obstacles now, BE CAREFUL!

Hard Mode

Press the W or S (UP or DOWN Arrow keys) to switch between the Foreground, the Middleground and the Background. (Android: Right Joystick UP & DOWN)

Even more DIFFICULT than Normal, STAY ALIVE!

Nightmare Mode

Nothing to say about your WORST NIGHTMARE, Good Luck.

Night

Vision is limited, your only friend (light source) is the moon (and some stars), STAY FOCUSED!

Bug: There are invisible obstacles, GLHF!!
